reviews.title: Felt scammed
reviews.text: My class was at 9:30 and I showed up at 9:29. The door was locked and nobody was in the lobby. I tried calling them and sent them a couple messages on WhatsApp, via their websites instructions. I have not heard anything back as well as did not receive a refund or was able to go to another class. Very upsetting as I was excited for the yoga class but was not able to participate but still had to pay.

reviews.title: Nice treat in Lima
reviews.text: I had a great experience at MATMAX yoga in Lima, small and cosy place to enjoy a nice Practice :)I really appreciated Moises class, he is special!Also the other teachers were nice.I will be back when in Lima!

reviews.title: Great way to start the day
reviews.text: Great class with Moises today; he was on top of our alignment and did a great job of guiding us through a slow but strong progression. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Good yoga class
reviews.text: Challenging but excellent yoga class. Free 1 hour session with Selina hostel and was a great studio with high quality equipment

reviews.title: Great experience
reviews.text: Really enjoyed my Ashtanga yoga class!! The whole vibe and experience was great!!! Upon walking in they were super welcoming. A bottle of water was included with the package too! They also had free lockers for us to put our things. What was even cooler was that the lockers had phone chargers built inside of them! By the time I was done with yoga my phone was completely charged! They also provided yoga mats and blocks. Would definitely recommend this class to anyone who has done yoga for years or is a beginner.

reviews.title: The perfect, mindful way to start each day when staying in Miraflores
reviews.text: In November, I was on a spiritual retreat to Peru with a few close friends. While we were staying in Miraflores, Lima, I was on the lookout for an early morning yoga class so that I could begin the day mindfully. The classes I took at Matmax Yoga were above and beyond what I was hoping for. The class was the perfect mix of strength building, while allowing for the breath work that comes with a Vinyasa flow. I felt rejuvenated after each class. The people who work here are genuine and I enjoyed authentic conversation with them, even though my Spanish is not as great as I would like it to be. I highly recommend everyone staying in the area takes a class at Matmax yoga!

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.text: Excellent experience, great studio w terrific instructors. When staying at the Selina hotel, yogis get a discounted rate

reviews.title: Amazing yoga class!!
reviews.text: I took a class this morning as I stayed at Selina (very nice place to stay by the way), with Andreas, and it was perfect! Nice adjustments, nice dynamic, nice studio! I recommend!

reviews.title: Great start of the day
reviews.text: Since I have stayed in nearby Selina, i did a morning yoga class with Andy. I really enjoyed it and found the space & the yoga flow very energizing. If I am back at Lima, Miraflores- would definitely come back again.

reviews.title: Great yoga class!
reviews.text: We did the morning yoga class with andres. It was peaceful, relaxing combined with hard work. Great environment and music. Very recommended!!
